column5: Everyone seems to be praising the Senko rigged "Wacky". I propose you can rig a Finesse Shad or soft plastic Minnow the same. Fish on!  http://www.lunkerhunt.com/riggingTips.cfm
I have been using these xact baits. I bought them at Fishingworld in Hamilton. I use them some of the same ways. I will even wacky rig a soft jerkbait sometimes to imitate a dead minnow falling down.
it is a hot way to catch fish.  cheers!
I love using Wacky rig seems to work every time.
looks like a wet noodle  " ya i hooked into a nice largemout on a spaghetti rig"  " you fishing with pasta, boy?"  " no, i'm using spaghetti"  "wait..what?"
